snippet.title: Eldest Souls - Guerrilla Collective Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Eldest Souls is a challenging, pixel-art boss-rush game.
Slaying Gods is no easy task. Prepare yourself to be overwhelmed by brutal, challenging encounters, in which only the most unrelenting will make it through.

Learn more: https://www.unitedlabelgames.com/eldest-souls/ 

Steam: https://bit.ly/3chsDTm
GOG.com: https://bit.ly/37sPDgB

Talk with us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/utdlabelgames + Fallen Flag Studio https://discord.com/invite/CDRQDFc 

#EldestSouls #UnitedLabel #indiegame

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/UnitedLabelGames/ + Fallen Flag Studio https://www.facebook.com/fallenflagstudio/
